data.title: #34 Brian Dannelly (SAVED!, School Spirits and More!)
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from The Wayne Holtz Podcast on Spotify. Wayniacs, We’re Back! And today we are welcoming a guest very close to my heart - Writer, director, producer (and so much more), Brian Dannelly! I first became familiar with Brian when he directed and co-wrote my Favorite Movie, SAVED, but his great work didn’t stop there, and I’ll just name a few. From directing the Chris Colfer film, Struck By Lighting, and working on iconic television hits like Weeds and Pushing Daisies, to now being a director on the upcoming Paramount+ series, School Spirits, we had a lot to talk about! Are we getting a Saved 2? What was the original plan for Hilary Faye? Does the upcoming murder mystery have a lot mores going on than the trailer hints at? Check out this hilarious, poignant, and tea-spilling episode now and find out!Follow Brian Dannelly on Instagram @BPDannellyFollow Wayne Holtz on Instagram at @WayneHoltz_ and @TheWayneHoltzPodcastFollow Wayne Holtz on Twitter at @WayneHoltzThis episode was produced and engineered by Nicholas PacheoThe music in this episode is from Wayne Holtz’s discography produced by Bobby RivasMake sure to SUBSCRIBE, RATE & REVIEW on Itunes (Apple Podcasts) and follow and listen on Spotify!
